maqras.text: 38|52|Mata hata ni wa, fushime-gachi no onaji toshigoro no (otome) ga haberu.
38|53|Korera wa seisan no hi no tame ni, anata gata ni yakusoku sa reru monodearu.
38|54|Hontoni kore wa, tsukiru koto no nai (anata gata e no) tamamonodearu.
38|55|(Omo o osoreru mono wa) kono yodearu. Daga hangyaku no itazurani wa, warui kaeri-sho ga arou.
38|56|Sore wa jigokudearu. Kare-ra wa soko de yaka reyou. Nanto warui fushidodearou ka.
38|57|(Jitsuni) kore wa, ko iu kotodaga kare-ra wa nietatsu yu to no o aji wa sa re,
38|58|sono soto, kore ni ruisuru (chobatsu) o tori awa sete ukeru koto ni naru.
38|59|Kore wa anata gata to issho ni, muyami ni tsukisusumu ichigundearu. Kare-ra ni wa kangei no kotoba mo nai. Hi goku de yaka reru dakedearu.

38|60|Kare-ra wa (hi goku no nakama wa kare-ra no shido-sha-tachi ni) iu. `Iya, kangei sa renai no wa, anata gatadesu. Watashi-tachi no tame ni, ko shimuketa no wa anata gatadesu. Nanto warui sumai ni kita monodeshou.'
38|61|Suru to kare-ra wa iu. `Omo yo, watashi-tachi o koko ni tsurete kita mono ni wa, hi goku de bai no chobatsu o o kuwae kudasai.'
38|62|Kare-ra (hi goku no nakama) wa iu. `Watashi-tachi ga akunin no naka ni kazoete ita hitobito ga mienai nodesu. Do shita nodeshou.
38|63|Watashi-tachi ga chosho shite ita mono (ga mienai). Kare-ra wa,(watashi-tachi no)-me o kurama seta node wanaideshou ka.'
38|64|Hontoni kore wa shinso de, hi goku no nakama no ronsodearu.
38|65|Gen tte yaru ga i. `Watashi wa keikoku-sha ni suginai. Yuiitsu no kata, teiko dekinai kata, arra no soto ni wa kami wa nai nodearu.
38|66|Ten to ji, soshite sonoaida no ban'yu no shu, iryoku narabinaku kan'yode ara reru.'
38|67|Itte yaru ga i. `Kore wa shiko no shirasedearu.
38|68|Anata gata wa, sorekara somuki saruga.
38|69|Katsute (tenshi no) takai ikai no mono-tachi no rongi ni tsuite wa, watashi wa nani no chishiki mo nakatta.
38|70|Kore ga watashi ni keiji sa reta no wa, tada watashi ga Komei ni keikoku suru tamedearu.'
38|71|Anata no omo ga, tenshi-tachi ni,`ware wa doro kara ningen o tsukurou to shite iru.' To ose rareta toki o omoe.
38|72|`Sorede ware ga, kare (ningen) o katachidzukuri, soreni rei o fukikondanaraba, anata gata wa fuku shite kare ni sajida shi nasai.'
38|73|Sokode tenshi-tachi wa, kai isseini sajida shitaga,
38|74|iburisu dake wa so shinakatta. Kare wa koman de, shinko o kobamu mono to natta.
38|75|Kare wa ose rareta. `Iburisu yo, ware no tezukara tsukutta mono ni sajida suru no ni, nani ga anata o samatageta no ka. Anata wa koman'na no ka, soretomo takai (iryoku aru)-shana no ka.'
38|76|Kare wa moshiageta. `Watashi wa kare (ningen) yori mo sugurete imasu, anata wa hi de watashi o o tsukuri ni narimashitaga, kare wa doro de tsukura reta dakedesu.'
38|77|Kare wa ose rareta. `Sorenara anata wa, koko kara dete iki nasai, hontoni imawashikara.
38|78|Soshite ware kara no mikagiri wa, shinpan no hi made kanarazu anata no ue ni arou.'
38|79|Kare wa moshiageta. `Omo yo, kare-ra ga yobiokosa reru hi made, yuyo o negaimasu.'
38|80|Kare wa ose rareta. `Anata o yuyo shiyou.
38|81|Sadame rareta nichiji made.'
38|82|Kare wa moshiageta. `Soredewa, anata no o iko ni kakete chikaimasu. Watashi wa kare-ra (ningen) subete no mono o yuwaku shimasu.
38|83|Kare-ra no naka no, anata no kenkyona shimo be o nozoite wa.'
38|84|Kare wa ose rareta. `Sore wa shinjitsudearu. Ware kara mo shinjitsu o iu.
38|85|Ware wa, anata to anata ni shitagau subete no mono de, jigoku o mitasudearou.'
38|86|Ie,`watashi wa kono (kuruan) ni taishi nani no hoshu mo anata gata ni motomenai. Mata watashi wa gizen-shade wanai.
38|87|Kore wa sho minzoku ni taisuru kunkai nihokanaranai.
38|88|Toki ga kitara, anata gata wa sore ga shinjitsudearu koto o kanarazu shirudearou.'
39|1|Kono Keisuke no keiji wa, iryoku narabinaku eimei de ara reru arra kara (kudasa reta mono)dearu.
39|2|Hontoni ware wa shinri ni yotte, anata ni kono Keisuke o kudashita. Sorede arra ni tsukae, shinjin no makoto o tsukuse.

39|3|Shinjin no makoto o tsukushite tsukaeru no wa, arra ni taishi tozende wanai ka. Daga kare o sashioite (hoka ni) hogo-sha o motomeru mono wa,`watashi-tachi ga kare-ra (kamigami) ni tsukaeru no wa tada watashi-tachi ga arra no o-gawa ni chikadzuku tamedearu.'(To iu). Hontoni arra wa kare-ra no kotonaru ten ni tsuite, kanarazu so no ma o saiketsu nasa reru. Arra wa, kyogi de onwowasureru-sha o onmichibiki ni nara renai.
39|4|Arra ga ko o motou to o nozominara, o jibun no tsukura reru mono no naka kara, nozomi no mono o eraba reru. Kare ni tatae are. Kare wa arra, yuiitsu ni shite (ban'yu no) seifuku-shadearu.

39|5|Kare wa shinri o motte tenchi o sozo nasa re, yoru o motte hiru o oi mata hiru o motte yoru o owa se, taiyo to tsuki o fukuju sa sete sorezore sadame rareta shuki ni unko sa seru. Hontoni kare wa, iryoku narabinaku yoku yurusa reru katadearu.

39|6|Kare wa anata gata o hitotsu no tamashi kara tsukuri, sorekara sono haigusha o tsukuri, mata kare wa 8-to no kachiku o shiyu de anata gata ni tsukawasa reta. Kare wa anata gata o haha no tainai ni tsukura re, 3ttsu no ankoku no naka ni oite, sozo ni tsugu sozo o nasa reta. Ko no yo ni, anata gata no shu arra ni taiken wa zokusuru. Kare no soto ni kami wa nai nodearu.Nanoni anata gata wa doshite somuki saru no ka.

39|7|Moshi anata gata ga shinjinakute mo, arra wa anata gata o hitsuyo to sa renai. Daga kare wa, shimo be-tachi no fushinjin o yorokoba re wa shinai. Shikashi kansha surunaraba, kare wa yorokoba reru. Omoni o ou mono wa,-gai no mono no omoni o ou koto wa dekinai. Yagate anata gata wa, jibun no omo no omoto ni kaeru nodearu. Sonotoki kare wa, anata gata no (gense ni okeru) okonai no subete o o tsuge ni naru. Hontoni kare wa,(hitobito no) mune ni daku koto o jukuchi nasa reru.
